entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as hurrying up the stone steps into the castle and helping Harry see Hagrid and Madame Maxime with the giant horses. She also speaks to Harry and Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking around and seeing Fleur Delacour hurrying up the stone steps into the castle and Hagrid helping Madame Maxime with the giant horses.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as helping Madame Maxime to back two of the giant horses into their harness.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as being helped by Hagrid with the giant horses.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking to Fleur Delacour and complimenting her English.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as scowling at Fleur Delacour.

entities.name: beauxbatons carriage
entities.description: The Beauxbatons carriage is mentioned as being about to take off.

relationships.description: Fleur Delacour greets Harry with a handshake and says she hopes to get a job here to improve her English.
Ron compliments Fleur Delacour's English, saying it is very good already.
